title: Lionel Hampton Midnight Sun(jazz)(flac)[rogercc]
description:
LIONEL HAMPTON MIDNIGHT SUN
Label:Verve
Recorded: 1946
CD Released: 20 July 2007
Format : Flac



Lionel Leo Hampton (April 20, 1908 ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ August 31, 2002) American jazz vibraphonist, pianist, percussionist, bandleader and actor. Like Red Norvo, he was one of the first jazz vibraphone players. Hampton ranks among the great names in jazz history, having worked with a who's who of jazz musicians, from Benny Goodman and Buddy Rich to Charlie Parker and Quincy Jones. In 1992, he was inducted into the Alabama Jazz Hall of Fame.
